title: Experiential Learning Course for AI Voice Assistant Application Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic computing concepts and intermediate-level domain expertise
context.additional_context: Learners in administrative/leadership roles acquire AI voice assistant application development through experiential learning applicable to real work environments.

learning_goals: Learners can implement basic voice recognition functionality using block-based programming tools
Learners can design AI voice assistant workflows by applying computational thinking (CT)
Learners can analyze potential societal impacts of AI technology use through real-scenario-based projects
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
